title: About
text: My name is Gunnar and I'm a front-end developer from Reykjavík, Iceland. I'm currently based in Stockholm, where I live with my girlfriend, our baby and our dog. My hobbies include football, disc golf and running.
I have been working as a front-end developer for five years now and I love creating beautiful user interfaces and exploring new technologies.
shortText: My name is Gunnar and I'm a front-end developer from Reykjavík, Iceland. I'm currently based in Stockholm, where I live with my girlfriend, our baby and our dog. I have been working as a front-end developer for five years.
